Mobster rolls away from the shots, and retreats toward the base, The
autoguns open fire on the enemies. (Your at my base now!)
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2000 4:08 PM
Subject: Re: There Is No Escape


> ::WarMachine/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::
>
> WarMachine roars as a shot hits him, taking a step back. He turns to
> face Mobster, two missiles along with a few rounds of laser shots
> heading for Mobster.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica flies out of the Alliance base, heading toward the battle
> between WarMachine and Mobster.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike tries to duck under Sharpedge's missile, but too late.
>
> The explosion sends him flipping back, regaining ballance and firing
> a missile off at Mobster, not being able to see Sharpedge anywhere.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > The others manage to get back to base. (No moding, they are near
> their base,
> > now) Deemos is still running around Mobster. (Nice name for a
> Gestalt, huh?)
> > Mobster takes the damage and growls. He fires back on Warmachine
> and then
> > fires at Oblitertron. He grabs Deemos, who complains and backflips
> away from
> > the 2 Gestalts...
>
>
>
>
>
